nodes.text: Imperial Outer Rim Territories Patrol Fleet
The Imperial Outer Rim Territories Patrol Fleet was a capital ship fleet of the Imperial Navy assigned to patrol and respond to threats in the Outer Rim Territories.

Early in the Galactic Civil War, prior to the Battle of Yavin and shortly thereafter, the fleet was under the command of Governor Bane Nothos until his capture at the hands of the Rebel Alliance and subsequent death.
